nodes.text: Alain Mauricet (known professionally as simply Mauricet) is a Belgian comic book writer and artist born in 1967. He notably worked for Le Journal de Spirou for about nine years, and currently works for DC Comics. He illustrated the short comic story "The Lost Eggs of Livorno", which was published as the secondary story of Star Wars Adventures Annual 2018 on April 18, 2018.
